rows.label: qst702609_msg0001
rows.name:
So the legends were true...
There really was gold buried in the
Dannagh Desert!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0002
rows.name: Parvi's dream came true!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0003
rows.name: ...Really?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0004
rows.name:
Are you sure the machine didn't just
find gold that traveling merchants
dropped accidentally?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0005
rows.name: It did seem to mostly be small change.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0006
rows.name: What a buzzkill.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0007
rows.name:
I can't believe we didn't find any
fabulous wealth after all that effort.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0008
rows.name:
I'd have made more money if I'd spent
my time feeding Armus back home.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0009
rows.name: Aw, cheer up!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0010
rows.name: Dudan had fun, Parvi!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0011
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0012
rows.name: I guess it was pretty fun, wasn't it?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0013
rows.name:
Thanks for all your help, everybody.
I'm sorry it was all for nothing.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0014
rows.name: Ah, don't worry about it.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0015
rows.name:
It was an entertaining diversion,
to say the least!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0016
rows.name: That's for sure.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0017
rows.name:
Dream of gold was beautiful while
it lasted, meh.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0101
rows.name:
B-b-b-bugs?!
Just a huge load of bugs?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0102
rows.name: Yeeeeach! Get rid of them!!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0103
rows.name: No, Parvi! These very valuable insects.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0104
rows.name: These things? Valuable?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0105
rows.name:
Bugs that came out are Dannagh Weta.
Worth a lot of money to right people.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0106
rows.name:
They're rather rare in Iira. People
use them in various medicines and
high-quality perfumes.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0107
rows.name:
That right. So fetch high price
at market.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0108
rows.name: So if we sell these...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0109
rows.name: We'll be rich?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0110
rows.name: Filthy rich!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0111
rows.name: WOO HOO!!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0112
rows.name: Hoo hoo hoo!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0113
rows.name:
Let's get back to the city
and celebrate!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0114
rows.name:
Dudan going to eat and drink until
body is five times current size!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0115
rows.name:
So were the legends of buried treasure
talking about Dannagh Weta all along,
do you think?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0116
rows.name: Looks that way.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0117
rows.name:
It's certainly possible that our
ancestors valued the insects so highly
that they referred to them as "gold".

rows.label: qst702609_msg0118
rows.name:
Indeed. Superbia has its own share
of such legends, too.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0119
rows.name: Fascinating.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0120
rows.name:
I don't know if it was more coincidence
than skill, but Marco did a great job
in the end, didn't he?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0121
rows.name:
He did.
And it proved to be very entertaining.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0122
rows.name:
I wonder if there's a similar explanation
behind other legends too.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0123
rows.name: Haha. Maybe so, my friend.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0124
rows.name: Maybe so.
